entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain early this morning. Local blowing snow. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 70 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
